__e: Mai Ling, what the hell does this have to do with this guy who's chasing you all over the Islands?
The guy you killed was like a big brother to me.
The answer to the question... "Charly Gordon?" is: Charly Gordon... is a fellow... who will very shortly be... what he used to be.
Couldn't be better, buddy, couldn't be better.
Comrade boss does not allow me although I have come from so far my father has to return on his own.
Comrade General, when I was a child, I wanted parents.
Not much defense there now, Comrade General.
I just need one day, Comrade General.
Can't say I do, Comrade Colonel.
It was a great gag, Lieutenant!
Comrade colonel, according to the instructions...
Comrade Captain, how long are we to hold here.
Comrade Captain, he says he came from the other side.
Lieutenant, 900 meters. So what do we do?
no, one says: 'Yes sir, as ordered! ', Comrade Lieutenant.
